subspecies.name: lion-morph
subspecies.description: An anthropomorphic lion, known as a 'lion-morph' when bipedal, and a 'liontaur' when the lower body is that of a feral lion. To be identified as a lion-morph, a character must be a panther without striped or spotted fur.
subspecies.statusEffectDescription: [npc.NamePos] body is extremely strong, and [npc.sheIsFull] capable of great feats of strength. [npc.She] also [npc.has] a high resistance to both natural and arcane heat.
